questions.audioPrompt: Where is the nearest train station?
Did you receive the meeting agenda?

choices.A: No, I think it was sent to James.
choices.B: Yes, it starts at ten o’clock.
choices.C: Let’s meet in the main hall.

questions.audioPrompt: Who's responsible for the client presentation?
Could you help me carry these boxes upstairs?

choices.A: Sure, just give me a second.
choices.B: No, I haven't seen the boxes.

questions.audioPrompt: When will the new software be installed?
Why didn’t you attend the quarterly review meeting?

choices.A: No, I didn’t review it yet.
choices.B: I had a conflict with another appointment.

questions.audioPrompt: Would you mind proofreading this report before lunch?

choices.B: Yes, I have lunch every day.

questions.audioPrompt: How long did it take to process the visa application?
You’re attending the cybersecurity conference next week, aren’t you?
Has the supplier responded to your inquiry yet?

choices.B: No, I'm still waiting to hear back.
